This page provides an overview of the traffic situation in the [EUROCONTROL Area](/definition/eurocontrol-area/). For a more detailed analysis consult our <a href="https://www.eurocontrol.int/Economics/DailyTrafficVariation-States.html " target="_blank">Daily traffic variation dashboard</a>. Information on en-route and terminal [service units](/acronym/su/) from the <a href="https://www.eurocontrol.int/crco" target="_blank">Central Route Charges Office of EUROCONTROL (CRCO)</a> is available from our <a href="https://www.eurocontrol.int/ServiceUnits/Dashboard/EnRouteMainDashboard.html" target="_blank">Service Units dashboard</a>.

<!-- script for traffic figures -->
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://www.gstatic.com/charts/loader.js"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var Data
  var my_view_traffic
  var last_day
  var last_day_text
  var last_week_text

  var day_traffic
  var dif_day_prev_week
  var dif_day_2019
  var dif_day_prev_year

  var week_traffic
  var avg_week_traffic
  var dif_week_prev_week
  var dif_week_2019
  var dif_week_prev_year
 
  var y2d_traffic
  var y2d_prev_year_traffic
  var y2d_2019_traffic 
  var avg_y2d_traffic
  var dif_y2d_2019
  var dif_y2d_prev_year

  google.load("visualization", "1.1", {
    packages: ["corechart", "table", "controls", "bar"]
  });
  google.setOnLoadCallback(Initialisation);

  function Initialisation() {
    var query = new google.visualization.Query(
      "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/14Lt3C3PCxxYCLXXYxRrFXd1s0tVZ3EQ8q9YfuYvx3Ww/edit?usp=sharing&sheet=NW_Flights_All"
    );

  query.send(drawDashboard);
  }

  function drawDashboard(response) {
    Data = response.getDataTable();
    UpdateTraffic();
   }
//---------------------------Update traffic---------------------------------------------
  function UpdateTraffic() {
  my_view_traffic = new google.visualization.DataView(Data);

  //       for (var y = 1; y < my_view_traffic.getNumberOfColumns(); y++) {
  //        // my_view_traffic.getValue(x, y) 
  //        last_day = my_view_traffic.getValue(0, y)
  //      }
  last_day = my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 38); 
  my_view_traffic.setRows(
  Data.getFilteredRows([{ column: 7, value: last_day }])
  );

// Calculate datestrings
last_day_text = last_day.toDateString();
    last_day_text = last_day_text.substring(8, 11) + last_day_text.substring(4, 8) + last_day_text.substring(11)

  //calculate 1st day of rolling week and string
  var first_week_day = new Date();
    first_week_day.setDate(last_day.getDate()-6);
    first_week_day = first_week_day.toDateString();
  last_week_text = first_week_day.substring(8, 11) + (last_day_text.substring(3, 7) == first_week_day.substring(4, 8) ? "" : first_week_day.substring(4, 8)) + "- " + last_day_text;
  y2d_day_text = last_day_text.substring(3, 7) == "Jan " ? "01 - " + last_day_text : "01 Jan - " + last_day_text

// Calculate traffic scorecard values
   day_traffic = my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 11);
   dif_day_prev_week = Math.round(my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 18)*100);
     dif_day_prev_week = (dif_day_prev_week > 0) ? "+" + dif_day_prev_week : "" + dif_day_prev_week
   dif_day_2019 = Math.round(my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 20) * 100) ;
     dif_day_2019 = (dif_day_2019 > 0) ? "+" + dif_day_2019 : "" + dif_day_2019
   dif_day_prev_year = Math.round(my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 19) * 100);
    dif_day_prev_year = (dif_day_prev_year > 0) ? "+" + dif_day_prev_year : "" + dif_day_prev_year;


  week_traffic = my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 21)
  avg_week_traffic = Math.round(week_traffic/7)
  dif_week_prev_week = Math.round(my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 27)*100);
     dif_week_prev_week = (dif_week_prev_week > 0) ? "+" + dif_week_prev_week : "" + dif_week_prev_week
  dif_week_2019 = Math.round(my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 29)*100);
     dif_week_2019 = (dif_week_2019 > 0) ? "+" + dif_week_2019 : "" + dif_week_2019
  dif_week_prev_year = Math.round(my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 28)*100);
     dif_week_prev_year = (dif_week_prev_year > 0) ? "+" + dif_week_prev_year : "" + dif_week_prev_year

  y2d_traffic = my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 30);
  y2d_prev_year_traffic = my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 31);
  y2d_2019_traffic = my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 32);
  
  avg_y2d_traffic = Math.round(my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 33));
  dif_y2d_2019 = Math.round(my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 37)*100);
     dif_y2d_2019 = (dif_y2d_2019 > 0) ? "+" + dif_y2d_2019 : "" + dif_y2d_2019
  dif_y2d_prev_year = Math.round(my_view_traffic.getValue(0, 36)*100);
     dif_y2d_prev_year = (dif_y2d_prev_year > 0) ? "+" + dif_y2d_prev_year : "" + dif_y2d_prev_year

// Update scorecard values
  document.getElementById("last_day").innerHTML = "Day (" + last_day_text + ")";
  document.getElementById("last_week").innerHTML = "Rolling week (" + last_week_text + ")";
  document.getElementById("y2d_day_text").innerHTML = "Year to date (" + y2d_day_text + ")";

  <!-- document.getElementById("last_day_dly").innerHTML = "Day (" + last_day_text + ")"; -->
  <!-- document.getElementById("last_week_dly").innerHTML = "Rolling week (" + last_week_text + ")"; -->
  <!-- document.getElementById("last_day_dly_flt").innerHTML = "Day (" + last_day_text + ")"; -->
  <!-- document.getElementById("last_week_dly_flt").innerHTML = "Rolling week (" + last_week_text + ")"; -->
  
  document.getElementById("day_traffic").innerHTML = String(day_traffic).replace(/(.)(?=(\d{3})+$)/g, '$1,');
  document.getElementById("dif_day_prev_week").innerHTML = String(dif_day_prev_week) + '%';
  document.getElementById("dif_day_2019").innerHTML = String(dif_day_2019) + '%';
  document.getElementById("dif_day_prev_year").innerHTML = String(dif_day_prev_year) + '%';

  document.getElementById("week_traffic").innerHTML = String(week_traffic).replace(/(.)(?=(\d{3})+$)/g, '$1,');
  document.getElementById("avg_week_traffic").innerHTML = String(avg_week_traffic).replace(/(.)(?=(\d{3})+$)/g, '$1,') + " daily flights";
  document.getElementById("dif_week_prev_week").innerHTML = String(dif_week_prev_week) + '%';
  document.getElementById("dif_week_2019").innerHTML = String(dif_week_2019) + '%';
  document.getElementById("dif_week_prev_year").innerHTML = String(dif_week_prev_year) + '%';
  
  document.getElementById("y2d_traffic").innerHTML = String(y2d_traffic).replace(/(.)(?=(\d{3})+$)/g, '$1,');
  document.getElementById("avg_y2d_traffic").innerHTML = String(avg_y2d_traffic).replace(/(.)(?=(\d{3})+$)/g, '$1,') + " daily flights";
  document.getElementById("dif_y2d_2019").innerHTML = String(dif_y2d_2019) + '%';
  document.getElementById("dif_y2d_prev_year").innerHTML = String(dif_y2d_prev_year) + '%';

  }
  
</script>
